item.title: Open vSwitch 错误记录。
item.description: rpmbuild -bb rhel/openvswitch-kmod-rhel6.spec produces warning: Installed (but unpackaged) file(s) found: /etc/depmod.d/openvswitch.conf 解决方法: 在openvswitch-kmod-rhel6.spec末尾出添加 %files %defattr(-,root,root,-) /etc/depmod.d/openvswitch.conf
